subject: Doping (Sports)
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: In filing a lawsuit against Major League Baseball and the player’s union, Alex Rodriguez made some of the evidence against him public, and it suggests he deserved to be punished.
snippet: In filing a lawsuit against Major League Baseball and the player’s union, Alex Rodriguez made some of the evidence against him public, and it suggests he deserved to be punished.
